profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.1.2 File header - Binary comment
profile.description: The file header line shall be immediately followed by a comment consisting of a % character followed by at least four characters, each of whose encoded byte values shall have a decimal value greater than 127
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: The file header line shall be immediately followed by a comment consisting of a % character followed by at least four characters, each of whose encoded byte values shall have a decimal value greater than 127

error.message: Binary comment in the file header is missing or does not comply PDF/A requirements
